NpcTalk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0d00><snd:TalkPositive>The blizzard's got all the grown-ups
working real hard.<sp:0:4:0>So I'm gonna work hard too! Gotta do
my part to help!
NpcTalk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>There's other kinds of <clr:0000>fruits <clr:ffff>besides <clr:0000>ice<clr:ffff>.
I've heard about <clr:0000>fire <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>electricity <clr:ffff>and
<clr:0000>water <clr:ffff>fruits too!<sp:0:4:0>If I stick 'em on <clr:0000>the tips of arrows<clr:ffff>, there's
<clr:0000>all kinds of effects <clr:ffff>I can pull off.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Then maybe my dad might use my arrows
with his bows!
NpcTalk_003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Thanks for helping me with the arrows!
I'll keep coming up with ideas.
NpcTalk_010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Mister...do you know anything about the
wooden arrows I left on the desk? <sp:5:0:0>Here's
the thing...
NpcTalk_011:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>So it was you, mister! <sp:5:1:0>If you need wooden
arrows, you just have to ask!
NpcTalk_006:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>It's so late... Dad gets crabby if I'm up
past my bedtime.<sp:0:4:0>The sooner I go to sleep, the sooner I can
wake up and start making arrows again.
NpcTalk_008:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01>Ah! <sp:5:0:0>Those are mine, mister!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>Hold on. <sp:5:1:0>Is your problem that you don't
have enough wooden arrows?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>That's OK, then! I don't mind giving them
to you. <sp:5:0:0>But hear me out first.
NpcTalk_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01>Ah! <sp:5:0:0>Those are mine, mister!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>Hold on. <sp:5:1:0>Is your problem that you don't
have enough wooden arrows?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>It's important to help each other in times
of need. That's what my papa says. So if
you want them, they're yours!
